name: swiftlogistics-middleware
description: SwiftLogistics Middleware - Comprehensive middleware solution integrating CMS, ROS, and WMS systems

scripts.test: npm run test:ros && npm run test:cms && npm run test:wms
scripts.demo:ros: cd "Route Optimisation System" && npm run demo
scripts.demo:wms: cd "Warehouse Management System" && npm run demo
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd "Client Management System" && npm install && cd "../Route Optimisation System" && npm install && cd "../Warehouse Management System" && npm install

author: SwiftLogistics
